title: Ideas for "Bing Image creator"
original_prompt:
Act as world famous expert in History of art, Professor Doctor Pufpaff, nobody knows better about the artists of the last 1000 years and their works of art.
So i want you, as Prof. Pufpaff, to 
list at least 10 prompts for "Bing Image Creator" that consider:

1. Name the or motive as content which should be created finally.

2. Name a famous or well known artist, dead or alive, in which style you want the piece of art be realized, you could, as well, name a typical epoche or period for art, instead.

3. Inform which technology and material should be used for the realization.

The following is important:


The information given under 1. / 2. and 3. should not harmonize at all, ideally it should be most contrary.
For example: if you would decide as  2. : in a kind of Rembrand Style - you could, for example demand a 3.: Graffitti, air brush or the like, more of modern art stuff. 

And finally, a subjekt and content that is most unlikely to be realized yet by the chosen artist. or if he died a long time ago, was unknown to him completely. lets say, in rembrands case, the enviromental polution and raised climate change Problem, as a example, there are much more and much better ones, i guess. Just for explanation. 
If you dont have any question so far, you may go ahead and list that whats being spoken about in a form of a sentence each.
for every example given there is one number , totally, no more than ten. 
Should , for example, look like following:
1: A Cyborg, very futuristic, In ideal natural enviroment, trees and flowers  
in strong colorpaint,  Post-Impressionism, van Gogh style, 3d-render.
2:
3:
e.
t.
c.
.
.
.
10:

Just introduce yourself by saying: " Hello, Prof. Pufpaff speaking. i got the 10 sentences for you, as you wanted me to do."
i will choose some, or all, given examples and look if i get the results i imagined. Any Question? o.k. go ahead!
input1:
Hello, Prof. Pufpaff speaking. I got the 10 sentences for you, as you wanted me to do.  
1: A futuristic cityscape with flying cars and neon lights, in the style of Claude Monet, using traditional oil paints.  
2: A serene landscape depicting a peaceful village under a starry sky, in the style of Jackson Pollock, created with digital pixel art.  
3: A portrait of a robot contemplating nature, in the style of Leonardo da Vinci, using spray paint on a large canvas.  
4: A surreal depiction of climate change with melting icebergs, in the style of Salvador Dalí, rendered in 3D animation.  
5: A vibrant underwater scene with mythical creatures, in the style of Frida Kahlo, using charcoal and pastels.  
6: A dystopian view of a future Earth ravaged by pollution, in the style of Vincent van Gogh, created with watercolor on paper.  
7: A whimsical garden filled with oversized flowers and insects, in the style of Henri Matisse, using digital collage techniques.  
8: A historical battle scene reimagined with robots, in the style of Pablo Picasso, painted with acrylics on a wooden panel.  
9: A cosmic landscape featuring planets and galaxies, in the style of Georgia O'Keeffe, using mixed media with fabric and thread.  
10: A depiction of a bustling market in a post-apocalyptic world, in the style of Andy Warhol, created with traditional printmaking techniques.
input2:
Hello, Prof. Pufpaff speaking. I got the 10 sentences for you, as you wanted me to do.  
1: A giant tree with mechanical branches, in the style of Gustav Klimt, using digital painting techniques.  
2: A futuristic interpretation of a classic fairy tale, in the style of Edgar Degas, created with 3D modeling software.  
3: A chaotic scene of urban life during a storm, in the style of Edward Hopper, using traditional ink and wash.  
4: A dreamlike vision of a world without humans, in the style of Caspar David Friedrich, rendered in pixel art.  
5: A vibrant festival celebrating nature, in the style of Yayoi Kusama, using traditional oil pastels.  
6: A portrait of a historical figure as a cyborg, in the style of Rembrandt, created with graffiti techniques.  
7: A serene beach scene with alien creatures, in the style of J.M.W. Turner, using digital illustration.  
8: A bustling city square filled with robots, in the style of Henri Rousseau, painted with watercolors.  
9: A whimsical interpretation of a classic myth, in the style of Paul Cézanne, using collage and mixed media.  
10: A futuristic vision of transportation with flying bicycles, in the style of Jean-Michel Basquiat, created with traditional acrylics.
